SELECT p.*, c.title, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id ) bookmark_count, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE content_id = c.id AND member_id = #{memberId} ) my_bookmark, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM good WHERE content_id = c.id ) good_count FROM responsePlanDetail p, content c WHERE p.id = c.id AND p.id = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO responsePlanDetail ( id, start_date, end_date, loc_category, review, status, grade ) VALUE ( #{id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{locCategory}, #{review}, #{status}, #{grade} )
